name: ts-for-gir-gjs-gtk-4-custom-widget-example
description: This example shows the usage of custom widgets and virtual functions in Gjs

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Gtk-4.0 Gdk-4.0 Graphene-1.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:app
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
